name: My Untitled Claw Prequel
description:
This is the first PREALPHA version! You can't do anything yet!

Controls:

Claw moves with arrow keys, Redtail with WSAD. Fighting is SPACE / F. Restart with R and end with ESCAPE.

Story:

I want this to be a prequel where we find out how Claw and Redtail were on a quest together for some magical artifact (maybe that's how Claw knows how to use MAGIC CLAW?). Anyway, I want them to meet all the characters from the original, like a true fan prequel.

Roadmap:

I'm doing this in my free time so don't expect constant updates. But I want to do:

1) Full movement control of Claw (and Redtail) like in original game - 5% done

2) Import some original level and play in co-op mode - 0% done

3) Add my own levels and storyline using existing assets - 0.1% done

4) Find someone to make similar art to Claw for new characters - 0% done

5) Polish it!!! - 0% done

Thanks,

Patkelus
